55972733129215550.Text: These are the rules of the Telvanni. If I steal from another Telvanni, but still live, then clearly I deserve whatever I stole. Murdering my opponents by magic or treachery is the traditional way of settling disputes. If I win, then clearly my argument has more merit. I may be expelled as in any other Great House, but most Telvanni will not care or even know about it.
